original_content:
Job Summary: 

We are seeking a skilled and experienced engineers with strong L3 support capabilities to join our front office L3 support team. This role involves troubleshooting, supporting, bug-fixing and optimizing existing systems while ensuring their high performance, scalability, and reliability. 

Must have: 
  •  Banking/Investment Banking experience is a must. 
  •  Good at coding, debugging & communication Skills. 
  •  Level L2, L3 Application Support experience + Development experience preferably in 4-10 years range 
  •  Need to go through CoderPad and interviews with Development team 
  •  Tech Skills – Any object oriented programming experience (Java, C++, Python, etc) 
  •  Role also need to follow all of the Below L2 hiring criteria.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This is a critical support role within our front office team, responsible for maintaining the high performance, scalability, and reliability of our core trading and investment banking systems. As a seasoned L3 support engineer, you will play a pivotal part in troubleshooting complex issues, implementing bug fixes, and optimizing existing systems to meet the evolving needs of our business. Your exceptional technical expertise, coupled with strong communication skills, will be instrumental in bridging the gap between our development and operations teams, ensuring seamless collaboration and efficient problem-solving.

Key Responsibilities:
- Provide advanced-level technical support for mission-critical trading and investment banking applications
- Investigate, diagnose, and resolve complex software bugs and performance issues
- Collaborate with development teams to implement effective bug fixes and system optimizations
- Proactively monitor system health and identify potential bottlenecks or areas for improvement
- Develop and maintain robust troubleshooting procedures and documentation
- Offer guidance and mentorship to junior support engineers to enhance the team's overall capabilities
- Participate in the evaluation and implementation of new technologies and tools to enhance system performance and reliability

Required Skills:
- Proficient in at least one object-oriented programming language (e.g., Java, C++, Python)
- Strong debugging and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to liaise effectively with cross-functional teams
- Thorough understanding of software development life cycles and best practices
- Ability to work under pressure and maintain a high level of productivity in a fast-paced environment

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with banking or investment banking software systems
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and DevOps practices
- Exposure to performance monitoring and optimization tools
- Working knowledge of containerization and cloud-based infrastructure

Required Experience:
- 4-10 years of experience in a similar L2 or L3 application support role, preferably in the banking or financial services industry
- Proven track record of successfully troubleshooting and resolving complex software issues
- Experience collaborating with development teams to implement effective bug fixes and system improvements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in a lead or senior support role, providing mentorship and guidance to junior team members
- Familiarity with trading or investment banking workflows and processes
- Exposure to implementing performance optimization strategies and techniques

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in Java, C++, or Python programming languages
- Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
- Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
- Exposure to containerization platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and fast-paced team environment, with a strong emphasis on cross-functional collaboration
- Agile development and DevOps methodologies, requiring flexibility and adaptability
- Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines
- Willingness to participate in on-call rotations and provide after-hours support as needed

Role Overview:
This role is crucial in ensuring the seamless operation and optimization of our Android-powered devices and meeting room solutions. As a key member of the Quality Assurance (QA) team, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing comprehensive test strategies to validate the functionality, performance, and user experience of our products. Your contributions will play a pivotal role in delivering high-quality, reliable, and innovative solutions to our customers.

Key Responsibilities:
- Attend daily agile stand-up meetings to stay informed and aligned with the development team
- Design and develop user stories, test designs, and test cases to thoroughly validate product features and functionalities
- Execute test cases and scenarios to identify and document any defects or issues
- Report and track identified defects through the QA release cycle
- Continuously learn and implement cutting-edge testing methodologies and technologies to enhance the QA process
- Participate in Sprint Planning calls to discuss upcoming releases and plan the QA cycle accordingly
- Provide regular status updates to the team, ensuring transparency and effective communication

Required Skills:
- Proficient in manual and automated testing techniques for mobile applications
- Strong understanding of software development life cycles and QA best practices
- Ability to read and interpret technical specifications and requirements
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and troubleshoot complex issues
- Effective communication and collaboration skills to work closely with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in testing Android-based applications and devices
- Familiarity with popular mobile testing frameworks and tools
- Hands-on experience with Agile methodologies and test management tools
- Understanding of mobile device hardware and OS-level functionalities

Required Experience:
- 2-3 years of experience in a quality assurance or software testing role, preferably in the mobile/consumer electronics industry
- Proven track record of successfully executing test cases and identifying defects in complex software projects

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in testing meeting room solutions or other enterprise-grade devices
- Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and trends in the mobile and IoT (Internet of Things) domains

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in using test management tools (e.g., Jira, TestRail)
- Familiarity with automated testing frameworks (e.g., Appium, Espresso, Selenium)
- Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative Agile environment with a focus on continuous integration and delivery
- Participation in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings
- Ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team, including developers, product managers, and other QA engineers
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and testing methodologies

Role Overview:
As a Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist for this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the exceptional performance and reliability of our Android-powered devices and meeting room solutions. Your expertise in designing and executing comprehensive test strategies will be instrumental in identifying and resolving issues, ultimately enhancing the user experience for our customers. You will work closely with the development team to drive the quality assurance process and contribute to the overall success of our product offerings.

Key Responsibilities:
- Actively participate in daily agile stand-up meetings to stay informed and aligned with the development team's progress
- Develop and maintain detailed user stories, test designs, and test cases to thoroughly validate product features and functionalities
- Meticulously execute test cases and scenarios to identify and document any defects or issues
- Effectively report and track identified defects through the QA release cycle, ensuring timely resolution
- Continuously explore and implement cutting-edge testing methodologies and technologies to improve the QA process
- Collaborate with the team during Sprint Planning calls to discuss upcoming releases and plan the QA cycle accordingly
- Provide regular and transparent status updates to the team, fostering effective communication and collaboration

Required Skills:
- Extensive experience in manual and automated testing of mobile applications, particularly Android-based
- Strong understanding of software development life cycles and QA best practices
- Ability to interpret technical specifications and requirements with a keen eye for detail
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to identify and troubleshoot complex issues
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience in testing meeting room solutions or other enterprise-grade devices
- Familiarity with popular mobile testing frameworks and tools (e.g., Appium, Espresso)
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and proficiency in using test management tools (e.g., Jira, TestRail)
- Knowledge of mobile device hardware and OS-level functionalities

Required Experience:
- 3-5 years of proven experience in a quality assurance or software testing role, with a strong focus on mobile applications
- Demonstrable track record of successfully executing test cases and identifying defects in complex software projects

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in the consumer electronics or IoT (Internet of Things) industry
- Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and trends in the mobile and enterprise device domains

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in using test management tools for planning, executing, and tracking test activities
- Expertise in automated testing frameworks and tools for mobile applications
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN) and continuous integration practices

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Fast-paced Agile environment with a focus on iterative development and continuous delivery
- Participation in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to ensure alignment and transparency
- Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and other QA engineers
- Willingness to continuously learn and adapt to new testing methodologies and technological advancements

Role Overview:
As a Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer for this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the exceptional quality and reliability of our Android-powered devices and meeting room solutions. Your expertise in designing, executing, and automating comprehensive test strategies will be instrumental in identifying and resolving issues, ultimately enhancing the user experience for our customers. You will work closely with the development team to drive the quality assurance process and contribute to the overall success of our product offerings.

Key Responsibilities:
- Actively participate in daily agile stand-up meetings to stay informed and aligned with the development team's progress
- Design and develop robust user stories, test designs, and test cases to thoroughly validate product features and functionalities
- Execute both manual and automated test cases to identify and document any defects or issues
- Effectively report and track identified defects through the QA release cycle, ensuring timely resolution
- Continuously research and implement cutting-edge testing methodologies and technologies to improve the QA process
- Collaborate with the team during Sprint Planning calls to discuss upcoming releases and plan the QA cycle accordingly
- Provide regular and transparent status updates to the team, fostering effective communication and collaboration

Required Skills:
- Extensive experience in manual and automated testing of mobile applications, particularly Android-based
- Proficient in designing and implementing comprehensive test strategies and test automation frameworks
- Strong understanding of software development life cycles and QA best practices
- Ability to interpret technical specifications and requirements with a keen eye for detail
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to identify and troubleshoot complex issues
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in testing meeting room solutions or other enterprise-grade devices
- Familiarity with popular mobile testing frameworks and tools (e.g., Appium, Espresso, Selenium)
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and proficiency in using test management tools (e.g., Jira, TestRail)
- Knowledge of mobile device hardware and OS-level functionalities

Required Experience:
- 5+ years of proven experience in a quality assurance or software testing role, with a strong focus on mobile applications
- Demonstrable track record of successfully executing test cases and identifying defects in complex software projects
- Experience in designing and implementing effective test automation strategies

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in the consumer electronics or IoT (Internet of Things) industry
- Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and trends in the mobile and enterprise device domains
- Involvement in cross-functional teams and collaborative project management

Tools & Technologies:
- Expertise in using test management tools for planning, executing, and tracking test activities
- Proficient in automated testing frameworks and tools for mobile applications (e.g., Appium, Espresso)
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN) and continuous integration practices

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Fast-paced Agile environment with a focus on iterative development and continuous delivery
- Participation in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to ensure alignment and transparency
- Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and other QA engineers
- Willingness to continuously learn and adapt to new testing methodologies and technological advancements
- Proactive in identifying and addressing quality risks and driving process improvements
